titles.title: If I Must Pass Through Waters Deep (easy nice*

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}If I must pass through waters deep I'll go and not repine Or climb the mountain rough and steep Thy will dear Lord not mine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}If I must feel the sharpened knife For pruning back the vine If this will bring new shoots of life Thy will dear Lord not mine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Or maybe take the lower seat If this is Thy design And watch my friends with honor meet Thy will dear Lord not mine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}If for a season I am cast Like gold to be refined Into the oven's fiery blast Thy will dear Lord not mine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Or crushed by sorrow's piercing dart As grapes are crushed for wine If this brings sweetness to Thy heart Thy will dear Lord not mine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}It's in the night time not at day The stars in beauty shine The darkness forms the milky way Thy will dear Lord not mine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}So come what may I will not stray But to Thy plan resign I still will walk the narrow way Thy will dear Lord not mine{/lang-eng}
